values: If someone or something is thin, they are not fat.
The man was thin because he didn’t eat much.
adj. 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的
n. 细小部分比较级:thinner, thinnest副 词:thinly

Thinly means in a way that is not thick or with very little substance.
Having a small distance between opposite surfaces; not thick.
